module.name: FreePBX Framework
module.changelog: *14.0.1beta16* Ensure update hooks are deleted *14.0.1beta15* Fix issue with compressed js library *14.0.1beta14* FREEPBX-14023 - Fix issues with yum updates *14.0.1beta13* Merge 13 changes in *14.0.1beta12* Quiet the chown during upgrades *14.0.1beta11* Bad javascript new line *14.0.1beta4* Testing of system updater in Module Admin *14.0.1beta1* Betaing *14.0.1alpha1* Inital Release
module.description: This module provides a facility to install bug fixes to the framework code that is not otherwise housed in a module
